description_txt: stated on April 24, 2013 in a House floor speech:
quote_txt: "In barely four years in office, five jihadists have reached their targets in the United States under Barack Obama," compared to zero "in over seven years after 9/11 under George W. Bush."

description_txt: stated on April 23, 2013 in a tweet:
quote_txt: "Why is President Obama unnecessarily delaying your flight? FAA could cut other spending."

description_txt: stated on April 25, 2013 in a tweet about the NFL Draft:
quote_txt: "Odd fact for odd draft: No. 2 overall pick will earn more than the No. 1 pick due to no state tax in Florida. So 2 not so bad."

description_txt: stated on April 15, 2013 in a press conference with Gov. Rick Perry, April 15, 2013:
quote_txt: Says businesses pay roughly 60 percent of taxes in Texas.

description_txt: stated on April 16, 2013 in an interview:
quote_txt: "Not one dime gets added to the deficit because of Social Security."

description_txt: stated on April 9, 2013 in a column.:
quote_txt: Says the U.S. fleet of attack submarines is scheduled to fall below the 48 boats that Navy says it needs to carry out current missions.

description_txt: stated on April 9, 2013:
quote_txt: On allowing a vote on universal gun background checks in the U.S. Senate.

description_txt: stated on April 18, 2013 in House floor debate on HB 845:
quote_txt: "Abortionists have reduced our black population by more than 25 percent since 1973."

description_txt: stated on April 15, 2013 in a news release about tax reform:
quote_txt: "The United States currently has the highest corporate tax rate in the world."

description_txt: stated on April 5, 2013 in an interview on CNN.:
quote_txt: Says he has "yet to get a response" from Barack Obama to his August 2010 letter making border security requests.

description_txt: stated on April 24, 2013 in an advertisement.:
quote_txt: "Texas ranks 49th in per-pupil funding among the states."

description_txt: stated on April 9, 2013 in a state Senate committee hearing April 9, 2013:
quote_txt: Says 315,000 mostly minority Texas students are enrolled in failing schools.

description_txt: stated on April 9, 2013 in a Facebook posting:
quote_txt: "Women in Ohio earn on average 77 cents for every dollar earned by a man."

description_txt: stated on April 2, 2013 in a news release:
quote_txt: "Schools in some states are spending up to 100 days a year doing test-prep or actual testing."

description_txt: stated on April 21, 2013 in a column in the South Florida Sun Sentinel:
quote_txt: The election bill "allows persons to correct an absentee ballot if they did not sign it and requires an extra two hours a day for early voting. Everything else in this bill is discretionary."

description_txt: stated on April 17, 2013 in an interview on C-SPAN.:
quote_txt: Says al Qaeda has camps with the drug cartels in Mexico.

description_txt: stated on April 22, 2013 in an interview with MSNBC:
quote_txt: The Boston Marathon bombing "is the fifth case" in which U.S. government officials examined individuals potentially involved in terrorism "and felt they were no threat and they went on to carry out terrorist murders."

description_txt: stated on March 26, 2013 in a speech:
quote_txt: About 3 percent of Gov. Nathan Deal’s appointments have been African-American.

description_txt: stated on April 12, 2013 in a TV interview:
quote_txt: Right now, if Rhode Island police come across a young person with a gun, "they really don't legally have the right to take it away from them."

description_txt: stated on April 10, 2013 in a county commission meeting:
quote_txt: The Miami Dolphins "are the only NFL team in the entire nation that pays property taxes."

description_txt: stated on April 17, 2013 in a speech on the Senate floor:
quote_txt: "No poll done this year ... shows less than a majority to reinstate a federal ban on assault weapons."

description_txt: stated on April 11, 2013 in a press release:
quote_txt: "Demand for public transportation is reaching record levels in Wisconsin."

description_txt: stated on April 5, 2013 in a letter:
quote_txt: Congress has spent 66 of the first 100 days of this term in recess.

description_txt: stated on March 12, 2013 in a statement.:
quote_txt: Says under his utility rate plan, "An estimated 50 percent of our residential households will see a decrease in their water and wastewater bills."

description_txt: stated on April 12, 2013 in a newspaper interview:
quote_txt: "The sex-offender registry has been around for a long time, and the research that's out there says that it has no positive impact on the public safety."

description_txt: stated on April 11, 2013 in a speech:
quote_txt: Says Abraham Lincoln supported an agreement that allowed slavery in New Mexico "and a law to return runaway slaves to their owners."

description_txt: stated on April 12, 2013 in a debate on WPRI's "Newsmakers program":
quote_txt: If an individual is determined "to commit suicide, the availability of a gun is not a factor" because they will find a way.
footer: By C. Eugene Emery Jr. • April 21, 2013

description_txt: stated on April 8, 2013 in a campaign flier:
quote_txt: Says "If you compare the Portland Metro area to the CDC’s statewide cavity rates ... the Portland Metro area would actually rank as having the 15th lowest cavity rate in the U.S."

description_txt: stated on April 17, 2013 in remarks in the White House Rose Garden:
quote_txt: A "wide majority of NRA households ... supported this legislation" on gun background checks.

description_txt: stated on April 17, 2013 in blog posts on the Internet:
quote_txt: Proposed immigration legislation would give new immigrants "a taxpayer-funded cellular phone."
